com.example.sickar.main.helpers

Class NetworkRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.sickar.main.helpers.NetworkRequest

  • public class NetworkRequest
extends Object
    Class to get and send network requests. Currently this is only configured to send requests to the SICK AR backend service.
